issue.title: <frame/>: Support multiple frames in a single parent? Intended scope of frames? Use link names as frames?

content.raw:
5) Link is a prototype. I'll be adding `frames` to each element that needs frame information. This might span a few pull requests.

6) I'm leaning toward stopping frame propagation at the model level. Do you want to see cross-model frame propagation?

7) Good point. I'll have to update the code to prevent duplicate names for all sibling elements.
content.html:
5) Link is a prototype. I'll be adding frames to each element that needs frame information. This might span a few pull requests.

6) I'm leaning toward stopping frame propagation at the model level. Do you want to see cross-model frame propagation?

7) Good point. I'll have to update the code to prevent duplicate names for all sibling elements.
